name: Clockwork Beetle Swarm
type: swarm of Tiny constructs,tome of Beasts
conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

trait.name: Swarm
text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny construct. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., up to 4 creatures in the swarm's space. Hit: 17 (5d6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.
